section: Impact of COVID-19 on Household Responsibilities
purpose: To highlight the increased burden on mothers during the COVID-19 crisis
title: The double double shift for mothers is untenable

bullets.text: Spend 15+ additional hours per work week on household responsibilities vs. prior to COVID-19 crisis
More likely than fathers to worry that their performance is being judged negatively because of their caregiving responsibilities
Have considered leaving the workforce or downshifting their careers since the start of the COVID-19 crisis

supporting_facts: Source: 2020 Women in the Workplace research
reasoning_strategy: Comparison of responsibilities between fathers and mothers
